info.name: shiftyy's MyAnimeList Dark+
info.description:
(Works only on MAL *PROFILE* page).

A simple dark recolor of mal profile page + some other design changes.

Main Features:
-Customizable Background Color
-Customizable Background Image
-Customizable Font Color
-Customizable Progress Graphs Color
-Hide "About Me" Section (Optional)
-Hide "Favorites" Section (Optional)
-Smaller "MAL" logo
-Remove RSS Feeds
-Remove Ads

Feel free to give me feedback or report any bug/inconsistency!

options.label: Image
